title: Civic Rights & Public Services
description: Know basic rights, documents, and how to access public services.

lessons.title: Important Documents
lessons.content: Common documents include Aadhaar, ration card, voter ID, and bank account. Keep photocopies and store originals safely.

quiz.question: Which is a common ID document in India?

lessons.title: Getting Help
lessons.content: If you face issues, use official helplines, CSC centers, or local offices. Avoid agents who ask for OTPs or large fees.

quiz.question: Who is safer to approach for government service help?
